page.title: 12Youth in Drayton
page.content: In our village the main gangs go around in two's or three's and sometimes in one main group.My gang has 6 children,3 girls and 3 boys.People resent us going around in big groups and I can understand why,when sometimes we play 'Knock,Knock Ginger'on someone's door and run!Although it is naughty it is a good laugh,and if people gave us more things to do we would'nt be like it.We used to have a youth club,which the vicar ran but in 1984 he moved away and the club closed down.Most of the time we sit on the war memorial and listen to music.We often get told off by the older generation of Drayton for having no respect,which I can totally agree with,but what else is there to do?When it is raining we go to the pub where a friend lives,and we listen to the juke box,slot machine and darts.
